reviews.text: One of the only hotels still open in Porto in October. We liked the impeccably clean room with separate toilet and bathroom, the beautiful 2nd floor view as well as the staff, who were friendly and helpful all along our stay. We actually found the situation quite convenient, as it was next to good restaurants and provided parking spaces. The road wasn't very busy in October and didn't bother us on the second floor.
reviews.title: Friendly, nice rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only downside, breakfast was a bit spartan for us who are used to a good cereal start into the day, especially when we go walking. All in all, very enjoyable.
reviews.title: Great location, amazing view

reviews.title: Excellent Family-run hotel with amazing views
Stunning views but pricey
reviews.text: The place is very well kept, quiet with an amazing view to the mountain and golf of Porto. What in Corsica is referred to as 'Mare e Monte', both mountain and sea at hand.
